relyingParties.name: BC Wallet Showcase
relyingParties.description: Provincial showcase demonstrating digital trust and identity solutions for British Columbia residents and businesses. Features various digital credential implementations and verification services.

relyingParties.name: Starfilm Cinema Age Verification
relyingParties.description: Demonstration application showcasing age verification capabilities for EU citizens and residents. This verifier service demonstrates privacy-preserving age verification flows using the EUDI Wallet ecosystem.

relyingParties.name: EUDI Reference Verifier
relyingParties.description: Reference verifier/relying party backend implementing OpenID4VP (1.0). Acts as a trusted verifier endpoint and provides APIs for initializing transactions and receiving wallet responses. Intended as a development/reference tool, not a production-ready verifier service.

relyingParties.name: EUDI Test Relying Party
relyingParties.description: Comprehensive test relying party for EUDI wallet ecosystem. Supports a wide range of credential types in both mDoc and SD-JWT-VC formats for testing various use cases including identity, health, finance, and mobility.

relyingParties.name: Vineyard Select
relyingParties.description: Age verification for online alcohol purchases. Customer proves they're 18+ without revealing exact birthdate using selective disclosure.

relyingParties.name: Nordic Digital Bank
relyingParties.description: Complete KYC identity verification for account opening. Full PID request with name, address, and national ID for comprehensive customer due diligence.

relyingParties.name: TechMarkt SIM-Activation
relyingParties.description: Identity verification for prepaid SIM card activation per German telecommunications law (TKG §172). Replaces traditional video-ident with wallet-based verification.

relyingParties.name: Berlin History Museum
relyingParties.description: Resident discount verification. Prove Berlin residency to receive 50% off museum admission without revealing other personal data using minimal disclosure.

relyingParties.name: SwiftBox Parcel Locker
relyingParties.description: Minimal disclosure for parcel pickup. Only verify your name matches the recipient – no birthdate, address, or ID required. Demonstrates privacy-preserving identity verification.

relyingParties.name: QES Signing
relyingParties.description: Reference relying party demonstrating a RP-centric remote signing flow, where a web application requests and verifies a PID credential from a wallet to authenticate the user and initiate a signing process.

relyingParties.name: CirculaCity
relyingParties.description: Sandbox portal demonstrating how government applications can use wallet-based credentials to enable trusted digital interactions in areas such as procurement, recruitment, and compliance.

relyingParties.name: Municipality of Rotterdam
relyingParties.description: Sandbox portal for the Municipality of Rotterdam, showcasing how government services can rely on wallet-based credentials for trusted access, verification, and decision-making.

relyingParties.name: MijnOverheid
relyingParties.description: Sandbox portal for MijnOverheid, where Dutch citizens can access and review information registered by Dutch public authorities.

relyingParties.name: Hak & Rein Vos Notarissen
relyingParties.description: Sandbox portal for a Dutch notary, showcasing a digital flow for entrepreneurs to provide the required information and documents to establish a company.

relyingParties.name: Kamer van Koophandel Frontoffice
relyingParties.description: Sandbox portal for the Dutch Chamber of Commerce, showcasing a digital flow for entrepreneurs to provide the required information to register a sole proprietorship.

relyingParties.name: DC API
relyingParties.description: Get started with the Digital Credential API - Request verified identity documents such as Mobile Driving Licenses or National ID cards

relyingParties.name: Individual Income Supplement (IIT)
relyingParties.description: Demo application flow for the Individual Income Supplement, including scenarios with and without a partner. Requires demo data in the Yivi wallet.

relyingParties.name: Compensation Card
relyingParties.description: Demo for applying for and using a municipal compensation card. Requires demo data in the Yivi wallet.

relyingParties.name: Discounted Bus Subscription
relyingParties.description: Demo application flow for a discounted public transport subscription for residents with a low income.

relyingParties.name: Participation Scheme
relyingParties.description: Demo application flow for a municipal participation scheme supporting access to sports, cultural, and social activities. Requires demo data in the Yivi wallet.

relyingParties.name: Cultural Heritage Pass
relyingParties.description: Fictional demo inspired by IntoNijmegen, showcasing a cultural pass with wallet-based issuance and usage for heritage venues.

relyingParties.name: Compensation Eligibility Check
relyingParties.description: Demo in which citizens share data once via their wallet to see which municipal schemes they are eligible for and activate them directly.

relyingParties.name: Mandate – Court-Appointed Administrator
relyingParties.description: Demo for legal representation by a court-appointed administrator, enabling login with Yivi and acting on behalf of a client in a municipal application.
useCases: Applying on behalf of another person

relyingParties.name: Mandate – Voluntary Authorization
relyingParties.description: Demo of voluntary authorization using a fictional Central Mandates Register, integrated into a municipal application flow.

relyingParties.name: Open Bank Account
relyingParties.description: Experience opening a new bank account using your EUDI wallet.

relyingParties.name: Bank Account Opening
relyingParties.description: Open a new bank account using your EUDI-wallet. Demonstrates secure identity verification for financial services using digital credentials.

relyingParties.name: Tax ID Issuance
relyingParties.description: Receive a Tax ID using your EUDI-wallet. Demonstrates government service access and credential issuance using digital identity.

relyingParties.name: Residence Certificate
relyingParties.description: Receive a residence certificate using your EUDI-wallet. Demonstrates municipal service delivery through digital credentials.

relyingParties.name: Loan Process (QES)
relyingParties.description: Review and approve your loan using Qualified Electronic Signature (QES). Demonstrates advanced e-signing capabilities with EUDI wallet for legally binding transactions.

relyingParties.name: Online Payment
relyingParties.description: Use your EUDI Wallet to shop online securely. Demonstrates payment credential verification for e-commerce transactions.

relyingParties.name: Bank Transfer
relyingParties.description: Use your EUDI Wallet to transfer funds to another account securely. Demonstrates authenticated payment authorization using digital credentials.

relyingParties.name: Inji Web Verifier
relyingParties.description: Web-based verifier for MOSIP/Inji credentials, allowing users to upload or scan credentials for verification.

relyingParties.name: Mijn Nijmegen - Yivi Login
relyingParties.description: Login to Mijn Nijmegen using Yivi to securely share your personal attributes. One of the first production implementations of attribute-based authentication in Dutch municipal services.

relyingParties.name: Multipaz Verifier
relyingParties.description: Multipaz verifier for requesting digital documents such as Mobile Driving License (mDL) and EU PID using W3C Digital Credentials API and OpenID4VP protocols. Part of the OpenWallet Foundation's experimental software ecosystem.

relyingParties.name: mDoc Web Verifier
relyingParties.description: Browser-based verifier for ISO/IEC 18013-5 mDoc credentials using proximity flows.
